00028   void ReportCollection::deleteReports()
00029   {
00030     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReport=theReports.begin();
00031     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator lastReport=theReports.end();
00032     while (iterReport != lastReport)
00033     {
00034       delete *iterReport;
00035       ++iterReport;
00036     }
00037   }

00039   int ReportCollection::addReport(DFLib::Abstract::Report *aReport)
00040   {
00041     theReports.push_back(aReport);
00042     return (theReports.size()-1); // return the index to this report.
00043   }

00045   bool ReportCollection::computeFixCutAverage(DFLib::Abstract::Point &FCA,
00046                                               vector<double> &FCA_stddev,
00047                                               double minAngle)
00048   {
00049     vector<double> tempVec;
00050     FixStatus fs;
00051     bool retval;
00052     int numCuts=0;
00053     vector<double> tempFCA;
00054     vector<double> tempScratch;
00055     DFLib::Abstract::Point *tempPoint;
00056     int reportnumI=0;
00057     int reportnumJ=0;
00058 
00059     // Make a point object that uses the same coordinate system that our
00060     // return object will use, and initialize it to 0.
00061     tempPoint = FCA.Clone();
00062     tempFCA.resize(2);
00063     tempFCA[0]=tempFCA[1]=0;
00064     tempPoint->setXY(tempFCA);
00065 
00066     FCA_stddev.resize(2);
00067     FCA_stddev[0]=FCA_stddev[1]=0;
00068 
00069     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReportI;
00070     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator reportEnd=theReports.end();
00071     // loop over all reports
00072     for (iterReportI=theReports.begin();iterReportI!=reportEnd;
00073          ++iterReportI)
00074     {
00075       reportnumJ=reportnumI+1;
00076       // loop over all reports after this one
00077       vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReportJ;
00078       for (iterReportJ=iterReportI,++iterReportJ;
00079            iterReportJ != reportEnd;
00080            ++iterReportJ)
00081       {
00082         double cutAngle;
00083         (*iterReportI)->computeFixCut(*iterReportJ,*tempPoint,cutAngle,fs);
00084         if (fs == GOOD_FIX && fabs(cutAngle) >= minAngle*M_PI/180.0)
00085         {
00086           numCuts++;
00087           tempVec = tempPoint->getUserCoords();
00088           tempFCA[0] += tempVec[0];
00089           tempFCA[1] += tempVec[1];
00090           FCA_stddev[0] += tempVec[0]*tempVec[0];
00091           FCA_stddev[1] += tempVec[1]*tempVec[1];
00092         }
00093         reportnumJ++;
00094       }
00095       reportnumI++;
00096     }
00097     if (numCuts != 0) // we actually got at least one cut
00098     {
00099       tempFCA[0] /= numCuts;
00100       tempFCA[1] /= numCuts;
00101       FCA_stddev[0] /= numCuts;
00102       FCA_stddev[1] /= numCuts;
00103       // FCA_stddev now has <tempFCA^2>.  Now compute 
00104       // sqrt((<tempFCA^2>-<tempFCA>^2)), the standard deviation
00105       FCA_stddev[0] = sqrt((FCA_stddev[0]-tempFCA[0]*tempFCA[0]));
00106       FCA_stddev[1] = sqrt((FCA_stddev[1]-tempFCA[1]*tempFCA[1]));
00107       retval = true;
00108     }
00109     else
00110     {
00111       retval = false;
00112     }
00113 
00114     FCA.setUserCoords(tempFCA);
00115     delete tempPoint;
00116     return retval;
00117   }

00121   void ReportCollection::computeMLFix(DFLib::Abstract::Point &MLFix)
00122   {
00123 
00124     DFLib::Util::Minimizer bogus(this);
00125     vector<double> NR_fix = MLFix.getXY();
00126     int j;
00127     double tempF=bogus.conjugateGradientMinimize(NR_fix,1e-5,j);
00128     MLFix.setXY(NR_fix);
00129   }

00137 
00138   double ReportCollection::computeCostFunction(vector<double> &evaluationPoint)
00139   {
00140     double f=0;
00141     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReport;
00142     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator reportEnd=theReports.end();
00143 
00144     // Loop over all reports, sum up 
00145     //    (1/(2*sigma^2)*(measured_bearing-bearing_to_point)^2
00146 
00147     for (iterReport=theReports.begin();
00148          iterReport!=reportEnd;
00149          ++iterReport)
00150     {
00151       double bearing = (*iterReport)->getReportBearingRadians();
00152       double bearing_to_point 
00153         = (*iterReport)->computeBearingToPoint(evaluationPoint);
00154       double sigma = (*iterReport)->getBearingStandardDeviationRadians();
00155 
00156       f += 1/(2*sigma*sigma)*(bearing_to_point-bearing)*
00157         (bearing_to_point-bearing);
00158     }
00159     return (f);
00160   }

00163   void 
00164   ReportCollection::computeCostFunctionAndGradient
00165   (
00166    vector<double> &evaluationPoint,
00167    double &f,
00168    vector<double> &gradient
00169    )
00170   {
00171 
00172     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReport;
00173     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator reportEnd=theReports.end();
00174 
00175     f=0;
00176     gradient.resize(2);
00177     gradient[0]=gradient[1]=0;
00178 
00179     // Loop over all reports, sum up 
00180     //    (1/(2*sigma^2)*(measured_bearing-bearing_to_point)^2
00181 
00182     for (iterReport=theReports.begin();
00183          iterReport!=reportEnd;
00184          ++iterReport)
00185     {
00186       double bearing = (*iterReport)->getReportBearingRadians();
00187       double bearing_to_point 
00188         = (*iterReport)->computeBearingToPoint(evaluationPoint);
00189       double sigma = (*iterReport)->getBearingStandardDeviationRadians();
00190       double deltatheta;
00191       double xr=
00192         (*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[0]-evaluationPoint[0];
00193       double yr=
00194         (*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[1]-evaluationPoint[1];
00195       double d=sqrt(xr*xr+yr*yr);
00196       double c=cos(bearing_to_point);
00197       double s=sin(bearing_to_point);
00198 
00199       deltatheta=(bearing-bearing_to_point);
00200 
00201       f += 1/(2*sigma*sigma)*(deltatheta*deltatheta);
00202       gradient[0] += (deltatheta)/(sigma*sigma*d)*(-c);
00203       gradient[1] += (deltatheta)/(sigma*sigma*d)*( s);
00204     }
00205   }

00208   void 
00209   ReportCollection::computeCostFunctionAndHessian
00210   (
00211    vector<double> &evaluationPoint, 
00212    double &f, vector<double> &gradient, vector<vector<double> > &hessian
00213    )
00214   {
00215 
00216     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReport;
00217     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator reportEnd=theReports.end();
00218 
00219     f=0;
00220     gradient.resize(2);
00221     gradient[0]=gradient[1]=0;
00222     hessian.resize(2);
00223     hessian[0].resize(2);
00224     hessian[1].resize(2);
00225     hessian[0][0]=hessian[0][1]=hessian[1][0]=hessian[1][1]=0.0;
00226 
00227     // Loop over all reports, sum up 
00228     //    (1/(2*sigma^2)*(measured_bearing-bearing_to_point)^2
00229 
00230     for (iterReport=theReports.begin();
00231          iterReport!=reportEnd;
00232          ++iterReport)
00233     {
00234       double bearing = (*iterReport)->getReportBearingRadians();
00235       double bearing_to_point 
00236         = (*iterReport)->computeBearingToPoint(evaluationPoint);
00237       double sigma = (*iterReport)->getBearingStandardDeviationRadians();
00238       double deltatheta=(bearing-bearing_to_point);
00239       double xr=
00240         (*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[0]-evaluationPoint[0];
00241       double yr=
00242         (*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[1]-evaluationPoint[1];
00243       double d=sqrt(xr*xr+yr*yr);
00244       double c=cos(bearing_to_point);
00245       double s=sin(bearing_to_point);
00246       double coef = (1/(sigma*sigma*d*d));
00247 
00248       deltatheta=(bearing-bearing_to_point);
00249 
00250       f += 1/(2*sigma*sigma)*(deltatheta*deltatheta);
00251       gradient[0] += (deltatheta)/(sigma*sigma*d)*(-c);
00252       gradient[1] += (deltatheta)/(sigma*sigma*d)*( s);
00253 
00254       hessian[0][0] += coef*(c*c-s*c*deltatheta);
00255       hessian[0][1] += coef*(-s*c-s*s*deltatheta);
00256       hessian[1][0] += coef*(-s*c+c*c*deltatheta);
00257       hessian[1][1] += coef*(s*s-c*s*deltatheta);
00258     }
00259   }
00260 
00262   void ReportCollection::computeLeastSquaresFix(DFLib::Abstract::Point &LS_Fix)
00263   {
00264 
00265     double atb1,atb2,a11,a12,a22;
00266     atb1=atb2=a11=a12=a22=0.0;
00267     double det;
00268     vector <double> LS_point;
00269     
00270     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator iterReport;
00271     vector<DFLib::Abstract::Report *>::iterator reportEnd=theReports.end();
00272     
00273     LS_point.resize(2);
00274     
00275     for (iterReport=theReports.begin();iterReport!=reportEnd;++iterReport)
00276     {
00277       double bearing=(*iterReport)->getReportBearingRadians();
00278       double c=cos(bearing);
00279       double s=sin(bearing);
00280       double rx=(*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[0];
00281       double ry=(*iterReport)->getReceiverLocation()[1];
00282       double b=rx*c-ry*s;
00283         
00284       atb1 += c*b;
00285       atb2 += -s*b;
00286       a11 += s*s;
00287       a12 += s*c;
00288       a22 += c*c;
00289     }
00290     
00291     det = a11*a22-a12*a12;
00292     
00293     LS_point[0]=(a11*atb1+a12*atb2)/det;
00294     LS_point[1]=(a12*atb1+a22*atb2)/det;
00295 
00296     LS_Fix.setXY(LS_point);
00297     LS_point = LS_Fix.getXY();
00298   }
